name: Raccoon Rascals
description:
You are playing as a member of the raccoon heist crew. After a successful heist you've gotten greedy and want to get all of the loot for yourself. Your goal is to steal all of the loot from your friends, but can you figure out who they are?

Hide in a group of friendly raccoons while trying to expose your friends.

2-4 Players required
Gamepad required

Controls Gamepad/Keyboard:
Movement - Left analog/WASD
Sprint - Right Trigger/Left Shift
Attack - West Button (Square on Playstation)/C
Interact - South Button (Cross on Playstation)/Spacebar

NOTE: If you are having issues with your gamepad not working in browser, please try using another browser or download the executable instead.
